title.rendered: AqualisBraemar continues to add to the London marine team

content.rendered:
We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our Marine team with Fena Boyle joining the London team.

“Fena is a former deck officer who joins AqualisBraemar today as part of our ongoing growth plan,” Said Mark McGurran, Group Managing Director of Marine. “Fena worked at sea for 8 years and moved ashore in 2014. After working in asset protection for a short period of time, Fena moved to a leading trade association where she oversaw the development safety policy for the maritime industry, managed the improvement of safety culture at sea and ashore and worked as part of a team determining the requirements of cadet and seafarer trainings. We are delighted to add her to our experienced and growing team as a surveyor.”

Fena Boyle joins AqualisBraemar bringing nearly 15 years’ experience in the maritime industry, with a broad range of skills and experience covering many aspects of the sector.

AqualisBraemar is the world’s leading provider of marine surveying and consultancy services to the marine insurance and shipping communities.

excerpt.rendered: We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our Marine team with Fena Boyle joining the London team.
